p: Measurements of N pool size in soil and plant as well as isotopic information of plant, soil organic, inorganic, microbial and mycorrhizal N pools was used to calculate (1) gross rates of ammonification and nitrification using isotope pool dilution approaches based on the data gained 6 hours and 48 hours after 15N labelling, (2) plant and microbial uptake of glutamine, NH 4 + and NO 3 -N using 15N tracing approaches for the first 6 hours after 15N labelling, and (3) 15N recovery in the investigated N pools. Formulas and further details are provided in the Supplementary Materials and Methods.
